plot: A young kid is left at his grandfathers for the afternoon. Little does he know he will be taking a trip through time with the strange artifact constructed by the old man.
title: La máquina del tiempo
plot_es: A young kid is left at his grandfathers for the afternoon. Little does he know he will be taking a trip through time with the strange artifact constructed by the old man.
plot_en: A young kid is left at his grandfathers for the afternoon. Little does he know he will be taking a trip through time with the strange artifact constructed by the old man.
